channel.title: CVE Feed for MediaTek, Inc. -- MT6983, MT8871, MT8891
channel.description: The latest CVEs for MediaTek, Inc. -- MT6983, MT8871, MT8891

item.title: CVE-2022-32616|2024-08-03T07:46:44.752Z -- mediatek%2C%20inc. -- mt6983%2C%20mt8871%2C%20mt8891
item.description: In isp, there is a possible out of bounds write due to uninitialized data. This could lead to local escalation of privilege with System execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation. Patch ID: ALPS07341258; Issue ID: ALPS07341258.

item.title: CVE-2022-32615|2024-08-03T07:46:44.343Z -- mediatek%2C%20inc. -- mt6983%2C%20mt8871%2C%20mt8891
item.description: In ccd, there is a possible out of bounds write due to uninitialized data. This could lead to local escalation of privilege with System execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation. Patch ID: ALPS07326559; Issue ID: ALPS07326559.
